question: The elements &ltDIV&gt and &ltSPAN&gt have the following characteristics
option1: Element &ltDIV&gt inherits properties defined for &ltSPAN&gt in a stylesheet
option2: Elements &ltSPAN&gt and &ltDIV&gt define content to be inline or block-level
option3: &ltDIV&gt and &ltSPAN&gt are used as alternatives for the element &ltP&gt
answer: Elements &ltSPAN&gt and &ltDIV&gt define content to be inline or block-level

question: Which of the following statement is not true regarding JavaScript?
option3: JavaScript is a loosely typed language
option4: A JavaScript embedded in an HTML document is compiled and executed by the client browser
answer: A JavaScript embedded in an HTML document is compiled and executed by the client browser

option1: An unvisited link is underlined and blue
option2: A visited link is underlined and red
option3: An active link is underlined and purple
answer: An unvisited link is underlined and blue

question: The href attribute in the link tag specifies the:
HTML Event Attributes onunload fires
option1: When the browser window has been closed
option2: When the browser window is minimized
option3: When the browser window has changed focus to other window
option4: After the page is finished loading
answer: When the browser window has been closed

question: HTML Form Events ___________, fires the moment that the element loses focus.
